title: How to Use wikiHow on Your Wii

steps.headline: Download the Internet Channel.
steps.description: Once it is downloaded, you should have the "Internet Channel" on your Wii menu.

steps.headline: Click on the "Internet Channel".
steps.description: You should have a screen that looks like the above screen.

steps.headline: Click "Start".
steps.description: You should come to a menu.

parts.name: Advanced Controls and How to Get to wikiHow:

steps.headline: Wait for the application to load.
steps.description: You should also see a joystick.

steps.headline: Understand the controls.
steps.description: Here are some pretty basic buttons: the "Back" and "Fourth" buttons, the refresh button, the three buttons we saw earlier, Wii Menu button, information button.

steps.headline: Go to wikiHow.
steps.description: You can either search for "wikiHow" or type the web address: wikiHow.com.

steps.headline: Go to any page you'd like to edit.
steps.description: Press the Edit button by pointing the Wii remote at the button and pressing "A" to click the button. To edit, click on anywhere you want to edit. A keyboard will appear. Press the letters to add anything to the article. Press Publish when you're done.

steps.headline: Go to the Community Dashboard.
steps.description: Press Explore and choose Community Dashboard. You can also type in the web address of the page: www.wikihow.com/Special:CommunityDashboard. Choose any tools you want to edit in and start editing.

steps.headline: Communicate with other editors by going to there talk pages.
steps.description: You can do this by clicking there username, and then clicking the Talk tab at the top left of the page. Scroll down and press the message box. Type in your message and press Post when you're done. If you want to preview, press Preview.

steps.headline: Visit the wikiHow forums.
steps.description: Type in the address: forums.wikihow.com . Press any discussion name and participate in the discussion.

steps.headline: Read articles.
steps.description: Go to the desired page and read it.
